definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[הִקְשִׁיב]] Je 23:18, Ps 66:19, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[יַקְשִׁב]] Is 42:23, etc.; Imv. ms. [[הַקְשֵׁב]] Job 33:21, esp. [[הַקְשִׁ֫יבָה]] Ps 5:3 +, etc.; Inf. cstr. [[הַקְשִׁיב]] 1Sa 15:22 +; Pt. [[מַקְשִׁיב]] Pr 1:24 +, pl. [[מַקְשִׁיבִים]] Ct So 8:13;—give attention (sts. + [[שָׁמַע]]); abs. Ho 5:1, 1Sa 15:22, Is 10:30, Is 28:23, Is 34:1, Is 49:1, Mic 1:2 + 12 t.; + [[אֶל]] pers. Je 18:19, Zec 1:4, Is 51:4 (‖[[הֶאֱזִינוּ ]]), [[לְ]] pers. Ps 55:3; + [[אֶל]] rei Je 18:18, Ne 9:34, Ps 142:7, [[עַל]] rei Je 6:19, Pr 17:4, Pr 29:12, [[ל]] rei Je 6:17, Is 48:18, Pr 4:20, Pr 5:1, Pr 7:24, Ps 5:3, Ct So 8:13, [[ב]] rei Ps 66:19, Ps 86:6; also c. acc. rei Je 23:18, Job 13:6, Ps 17:1, Ps 61:2; acc. cogn. Is 21:7; appar. = cause to attend, c. acc. [[אָזְנֶָךָ]] Pr 2:2 (+ [[ל]] rei), Ps 10:17, but usage would be so late and rare that [[אָזֱנ֑ךָ]] is prob. Subj. rei (Ges:§ 144 m Da:Synt. § 109. R. 3).
